name: Pizza Runner (carson)
description:
Overview

You are the waiter at a new and hot pizza place...

You need to deliver the correct pizzas to your customers but be careful! Some of them are snobs and walk out!

If 5 people walk out you are fired and it is game over

Controls

Move around the map using W A S and D 

Talk to customers and the chef using E

Pick up the pizza on the tray using F and deliver it to the correct customer using F

Press space to exit a dialog

Objective

Try to last as long as you can without being fired
